arts.ttl: Inter Milan Coach Cristian Chivu “Proud” Of Nerazzurri Team After “Fighting & Suffering” In Win At Roma
arts.sum: Cristian Chivu was full of admiration for his players after Inter Milan made it five wins in a row by defeating Roma 1-0 at the Stadio Olimpico – a result that sends the Nerazzurri joint-top of Serie A alongside the Giallorossi and Napoli. arts.ttl: Inter Milan Head Coach Praises “Show Of Character” & Claims “We Deserved The Win” Against Roma
arts.sum: Cristian Chivu was full of pride after watching Inter Milan grind out a 1-0 win over Roma at the Stadio Olimpico. arts.ttl: Inter Milan Shot-Stopper After Win Over Roma: “We Had To Give Everything – Staying Calm Has Made Us Stronger”
arts.sum: Yann Sommer was full of praise for Inter Milan’s maturity and defensive solidity after the Nerazzurri battled to a 1-0 victory over Roma at the Stadio Olimpico. arts.ttl: Italy Star Hails Inter Milan Mentality And Chivu As “Example To Us All” After Win At Roma
arts.sum: Nicolo Barella reflected proudly on Inter Milan’s Serie A victory and praised head coach Cristian Chivu as the Nerazzurri edged Roma 1-0 at the Stadio Olimpico, climbing to the top of the table alongside the Giallorossi and Napoli. arts.ttl: Roma 0-1 Inter – Nerazzurri Match-Winner: “We Worked As A Team – These Three Points Mean A Lot For Us”
arts.sum: Ange-Yoan Bonny was once again the difference-maker for Inter Milan, scoring the only goal of the game as Cristian Chivu’s side beat Roma 1-0 at the Stadio Olimpico.
